channel.title: Smf, Cant find the Manage Styles under admin... xd
channel.description:
Yo guys, Im trying to make my forum look like this [url=http://www.styleyourforum.com/preview/index.php?topic=1.0]http://www.styleyourforum.com/preview/index.php?topic=1.0[/url]
With this release [url=http://www.smfsupport.com/support/stylesheet-codes/%28%28stylesheet%29%29-runescape-v2/msg107934/#msg107934]http://www.smfsupport.com/support/stylesheet-codes/%28%28stylesheet%29%29-runescape-v2/msg107934/#msg107934[/url]
So i followed a little tutorial how to create a new stylesheet in smf Here: [url=http://www.smfsupport.com/support/stylesheet-codes/how-to-install-a-stylesheet/msg72839/]http://www.smfsupport.com/support/stylesheet-codes/how-to-install-a-stylesheet/msg72839/[/url]
But i can't find the Manage styles at configuration.... There is a "Create" button where i need to put the new css code in. Would be cool if someone could help me with this ;)

item.title: Smf, Cant find the Manage Styles under admin... xd
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

If you’re just looking for the way to access the stylesheets; Admin -> Configuration -> Themes and Layout -> Theme Settings and it’s at the very top.

Read full topic
item.source: Smf, Cant find the Manage Styles under admin... xd

item.title: Smf, Cant find the Manage Styles under admin... xd
item.dc:creator: @oldschool-scape oldschool-scape
item.description:
@oldschool-scape wrote:

Yo guys, Im trying to make my forum look like this http://www.styleyourforum.com/preview/index.php?topic=1.0

With this release http://www.smfsupport.com/support/stylesheet-codes/%28%28stylesheet%29%29-runescape-v2/msg107934/#msg107934

So i followed a little tutorial how to create a new stylesheet in smf Here: http://www.smfsupport.com/support/stylesheet-codes/how-to-install-a-stylesheet/msg72839/

But i can’t find the Manage styles at configuration… There is a “Create” button where i need to put the new css code in.
Would be cool if someone could help me with this

Read full topic
